channel.title: Presentations on Cerebral Mastication

item.title: Slides from rstudio::conf 2019
item.description: I had amazingly positive feedback from my repsentation today at rstudio::conf in Austin. While I’d like to think the response was because of my fantastic choice of GIFs illustrating what analysts do for a living: Figure 1: Analyst in Action file The real reason it was so memorable, however, was the wonderful custom images from Allison Horst. Alison’s sad and happy apps really stole the show!
